channel.title: Fool killed while hiding?
channel.description:
#### What happened? Playing as Fool night 2, after framing n1 and nothing else of note happening. I press hide at around 8 seconds left on the night. I receieve 3 messages that night: 1. You will hide tonight 2. You hid from all visitors 3. You were attacked
afterwords, i was dead immediately.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? To my knowledge, Hide prevents all visits. This should prevent all people, including attackers, from visiting Fool, preventing night actions targeting them.
#### Steps to reproduce: Unknown. I have no idea what class caused the attack. Didn't stay to see what kind of game it ended up being, i was angry.
#### Comments: While i don't have a way to check this or prove it, i suspect it was an assassin or a cult leader. I think the NK that game was the Reaper, and i didn't receive a "Reaped" notice alongside the attack.
Edit: Jester to Fool. Whoops. Old Town of Salem lingo sticking around.
